# redfox Provider
```terraform
provider "redfox" {
  address = "metadata.acme.com:443"
  use_tls = true
}
```




<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `address` (String) Red-Fox Grpc Address, <domain>:<port>
- `use_tls` (Boolean) Flag of Use Tls Connection
